kindergarten_vocab.chore: a routine task, especially a household one
kindergarten_vocab.invitation: a written or verbal request inviting someone to go somewhere or to do something
kindergarten_vocab.polite: having or showing behavior that is respectful and considerate of other people
kindergarten_vocab.wiggle: move or cause to move up and down from side to side with small rapid movemements

first_grade_vocab.caution: care taken to avoid danger or mistakes
first_grade_vocab.flee: run away from a place or situation of danger

second_grade_vocab.career: an occuption undertaken for a significant period of a person's life and opportunities for progress
second_grade_vocab.discard: get rid of (someone or something) as no longer useful or desirable
second_grade_vocab.luxury: the state of great comfort and extravagant living
second_grade_vocab.tremble: (of a person or part of the body) shake involuntarily, typically as a result of anxiety, excitement, or frailty
